name: Super Major Music Parade
description:
An endless runner game that involves:
- Shooting and avoiding bad notes
- Collecting good notes
- Pressing corresponding keys to play notes
- Using different instruments
- Unlocking fans
- Getting High Scores

Controls:
Shoot: Spacebar
Jump/Slide: Up and Down Arrow keys

The game started off as a stupid project so that I could enter a jam and I ended up enjoying the development of the game and taking it seriously. Donations will be helpful for further developments in the game.
